item.description:
All,

Flag football at Cambridge Common will continue, year round and regardless of weather conditions. We all hope that you can make it this weekend at 2PM. We are a stones throw from the Harvard Square T-stop.

All are welcome to join. We are looking to have a fun outing with flag-football players of all skill levels. Even if you never played flag-football before, it is easy to catch on, and you will have a great time. We have a great bunch of players. For the regulars, it will be exciting to get back out there and continue playing.

I hope to see you Saturday.

- Cambridge Flag-Footballers
item.name: Flag Football - 2PM - Saturday
